t: Hallelujah!*pn Happy*ln is the person who fears the Lord,*s taking*ln great delight in his commands.
His*ln descendants will be powerful in the land; the*ln generation of the upright will be blessed.
Wealth*ln and riches are in his house, and*ln his righteousness endures forever.
Light*ln shines in the darkness for the upright. He*ln is gracious, compassionate, and righteous.
Good*ln will come to the one who lends generously and*ln conducts his business fairly.
He*ln will never be shaken. The*ln righteous one will be remembered forever.
He*ln will not fear bad news; his*ln heart is confident, trusting in the Lord.*s
His*ln heart is assured; he will not fear. In*ln the end he will look in triumph on his foes.
He*ln distributes freely to the poor; his*ln righteousness endures forever. His*ln horn will be exalted in honor.
The*pn wicked one will see it and be angry; he*ln will gnash his teeth in despair. The*ln desire of the wicked leads to ruin.
